entry.title: Please Notice Me, Mr. Wayne!
entry.summary:
Author: alohamoron

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,037Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 145

Summary: Clark Kent has always been obsessive. From the moment he was born, his mind latched onto things without ever realizing it was unusual. Maybe it was because he was an alien raised among humans, or maybe it was simply his nature. As a child his obsessions shifted from puzzles to chess, each one consuming him completely before giving way to the next. But now, as an adult, he has discovered a fixation unlike any before. His attention has settled on Bruce Wayne, the enigmatic billionaire of Gotham.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,277Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 73

Summary: There were rumours all over Gotham of the ‘prince’ crashing out. There were pictures of Bruce Wayne in the news in which he was waving away the paparazzi as he walked out of a drug store carrying an armful of painkillers at three in the morning; wandering around in Crime Alley with a dime bag and a half-empty bottle of whiskey more expensive than most people could even dream about—and that same image came up in the news next to one of him in a gurney, bruises all over his face and body, unconscious. Some people thought it was understandable, considering one of his adopted kids had just gone missing. Others thought it was a disgrace for a man to be acting like this when the police were doing everything in their power to bring the kid back... Everything in the world is about sex, except sex. Sex is about power. After Jason died, Bruce was a wreck. He went off the deep end, succumbing to vices he'd never touched before. He lost himself in decisions he hoped he could leave in his past, but they're catching up faster than he's willing to meet them

entry.title: Blackbird in Ivy
entry.summary:
Author: sweethoneysuckle (blea_my)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,918Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 263

Summary: College Au- Superbat Clark Kent had the perfect university life—top grades, a steady spot as campus journalist, good friends, and even a girlfriend. Everything was in place until Bruce Wayne transferred in from an elite school,a rich, reckless brat with an insufferably smug, Bruce seems determined to unravel Clark’s perfectly ordered world and seems to live just to get under Clark’s skin… and maybe, under it all, into his world.

entry.title: A touch too close
entry.summary:
Author: sorumii

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,190Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 91

Summary: Clark was doing his best to respect Batman’s boundaries and stay out of Gotham, just like he’d been asked. But something kept pulling him toward the quiet vigilante. There was an ache in his chest, an unshakable urge to understand him: his motivations, his past, and, if Clark dared to be too hopeful, uncover his identity. But what happens when circumstances force them closer in a way Clark never expected? A hostage situation takes a strange turn when they’re trapped in a cloud of mysterious gas, one that strips away control and unleashes instincts they’d never dare to act on if not pushed to the edge....In which Clark and Bruce are exposed to sex pollen and find it impossible to resist their deepest, most primal urges.

entry.title: Red Rain
entry.summary:
Author: slashyrogue

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,020Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “It’s suicide, Kal.” Clark’s jaw tightened as he glared at Diana. “It’s Bruce.” The world had changed in the past few years, far more than any of them could’ve prepared for, and Clark watched nearly everyone he loved be taken over by monsters that they couldn’t stop. He’d had to kill more of his friends and family than he ever would’ve wanted, and yet there was one person affected by this evil who was still alive: Bruce. But he had nothing left to lose. Lois was gone, his parents long dead, and his team was obliterated. He just wanted to try to get to Bruce. Just one more time.

entry.title: A Shadow Of A Ghost
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,300Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 876

Summary: Danyal Al Ghul was the younger twin brother of Damian Al Ghul, and destined to be his brother’s right hand man, the ghost that whispered the secrets of others in his ear. Danyal was a dangerous foe to have, one that could look at you and know all of your secrets, one that could vanish right in front of you. So, it was both the saddest and the happiest day when Danyal Al Ghul and his guards disappeared, all thought to be dead, when he was ten.Danny Fenton was the quiet weird kid that the strange, eccentric Drs. Maddie and Jack Fenton found and adopted one day. He was deathly silent, and yet with one look from his piercing blue eyes he could silence you. Even with his weird aura around him, he managed to pull two of the only other weird kids into being his best friends. The three of them were inseparable and seemed to have developed their own silent communications.Danny is weirdly smart about certain things and yet seems to be failing his English class. Danny is forced to write an essay that just so happens to win his English class a week-long trip to Gotham. Surely nothing could go wrong with a group of teenagers from Amity Park and the two adults accompanying them in Gotham?
